summary: Created for my Hammerfell theme mod ''The Old Man Of The Mountain''
descriptionHtml:
1-Sorry for my terrible English lol
2-I'm new to this job (Please don't hurt me :D)

I create this clothes for my Hammerfell theme mod ''The Old Man Of The Mountain'' but maybe somebody like this.

[size=4][color=#0000ff]-CONTENT-[/color]
[/size]1-Enc.Boots(Wearer is muffled and moves silently)
2-Enc.Clothes(Health regenerates 20% faster)
3-Enc.Hood(One handed attacks do 25% more damage)
4-Boots+Clothes without enc.
[color=#ff0000][size=6]-ATTENTION!!!-[/size]
[size=4]([b]Known Issues)[/b][/size]
[/color][size=4]1-Hoods causing the CTD with females (Actually i don't know why maybe somebody fix it)
2-Hoods causing clipping issues some hair models (I try to fix this)[/size]
[size=4]3-Body mods??I have no idea just try and tell me[/size]
[color=#0000ff][size=5]-Instructions-[/size]
[/color]1-Download file
2-Open file
3-Drag and drop contents to your Skyrim ''DATA'' folder
4-Â Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox
5-Press ~ to open up console
- Type help "redguardassassin" and press enter
- You should see a list of all 5 items and their numerical codes
- Type player.additem ......... 1 and replace the dots with the code of the item you want to spawn
- Do this for all 3 pieces.
[size=6]ENJOY[/size]
author: RolloTheBerserker
